name: Slime Bomber
description:
This is a short game I made as a school project. It's a minimalistic bomberman replica with slimes that need some bombing! Download the ZIP file to start playing now!

Art used in the menus and slime enemies are made from scratch with Aseprite. Music was made from scratch on BeepBox! https://www.beepbox.co/

ATTENTION! I do not own the player sprites or the animations used with it. Those are made by the extremely talented Ansimuz. Bombs, explosions and level visuals are all from the Brackeys Bomberman tutorial. Links down below:

https://ansimuz.itch.io/top-down-adventure-assets

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ilXO5rBa6dw

TUTORIAL
- Move with WASD
- Press Space to place bombs
- Reach the stairs unharmed to complete a level
- You only have 1 life, so watch out!
